item.title: APSB25-85: APSB25-85: Security update available for Adobe Acrobat Reader
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates. More details in the security bulletin.
Products: Adobe Acrobat, Adobe Acrobat Reader Severity: Important
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/acrobat/apsb25-85.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
